00021 template<class _key, class _value, class _hash = Hash<_key>()>
00022 class Dictionary : public Object {
00023     friend class DictClctEntries;
00024 public:
00025     typedef _key Key;
00026     typedef _value Value;
00027     typedef _hash HashFunction;
00028 public:
00029     Dictionary(std::size_t initialCapacity = 11, float loadFactor = .75f);
00030     Dictionary(Dictionary<Key,Value,HashFunction> & orig);
00031 
00032     virtual ~Dictionary();
00033 
00034     void clear();
00035     bool containsKey(Key & key) const;
00036     bool containsValue(Value & value) const;
00037     const Collection<DictionaryEntry*> entrySet();
00038     std::size_t size();
00039 
00040     Value * get(Key & key);
00041     const Value * get(Key & key) const;
00042 
00043     DictionaryPointer<Key> operator[](Key & key);
00044     const DictionaryPointer<Key> operator[](Key & key) const;
00045 
00046     bool empty();
00047     const Collection<Key> keys();
00048     const Collection<Value *> values();
00049 
00050     Value * put(Key & key, Value * value);
00051     void putAll(Dictionary<Key,Value,HashFunction> & dict);
00052 
00053     Value * remove(Key & key);
00054 
00055     
00056     template<class T>
00057     DictionaryIterator<T,Key,Value*> iterator(DictionaryIteratorType type);
00058     DictionaryIterator<Key,Key,Value*> keyIterator();
00059     DictionaryIterator<Value*,Key,Value*> valueIterator();
00060     DictionaryIterator<DictionaryEntry *,Key,Value*> entryIterator();
00061 private:
00062     std::size_t size;
00063     Array<DictionaryEntry<Key,Value>*> * buckets;
00064     std::size_t threshold;
00065     float loadFactor;
00066     HashFunction hashf;
00067     int hash(Key & key);
00068     void rehash();
00069 };
